attributes.action: fight for the patients being held in hospital despite professionals admitting that they dont need hospital care!
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to fight against patients being detained sectioned in hospital despite the fact that professionalz and the consultant dr have stated that they dont need hospital care. A lot of this goes on but this is is actually a criminal offence called ILLEGAL DETENTION.

Lets not forget about the 5,000 people that were wrongly sectioned due to the governments error.. http://m.bbc.co.uk/news/health-20126569

Michelle is living in a rehab unit on a section 3 despite the dr admitting she dosent need to be in hospital! This is a criminal offence and id like the government to look at this issue again with a view to changing the criteria for detention under a Mental Health Section because at present too many people are being put on without fitting the criteria.

Written by M.Proby
